ygData.subject: Finally.
ygData.msgSnippet: Got level 49 more than two weeks ago.  Could only play on weekends. Some recent highlights: 1.  Died 7 times in Plane of Hate.  My cleric never quite got just
ygData.messageBody:
Got level 49 more than two weeks ago. Could only play on weekends.
Some recent highlights:

1. Died 7 times in Plane of Hate. My cleric never quite got just how
few Hit Points I have.
2. Died 3 times to bad trains in Lower Guk.
3. Died once in Sebelis. Five frog pull, four frogs decided that, of
24 people there, I was the tastiest. Never died so fast in my playing
career. The red just plummeted straight down to nothing, without
stopping once.
4. Died three times in City of Mist, including once when I had managed
to fall asleep. Hey, sometimes people just take too darn long to get
organized, you know?
5. Died to another bad train in Lower Guk.
6. Died in Skyfire, just a big pile of bad guys all at once.

Hmm. 16 deaths in one level. How embarrassing is that? Curiously, I
never got negative experience for a day. Thank goodness for level 49
rezzes. Just didn't get much positive experience. Hehe.

But! (And yes, it's anti-climactic for many of you, but tough), I got
level 50! Giants in Burning Woods finally did the trick. :)

Kenross Cantoforjado, 50 songs, Innoruuk
